visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series named 'Temperature 2022' and 'Temperature 2023', each with monthly temperature data. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has custom margins for better spacing. The x-axis and y-axis are styled with specific colors and font sizes for labels and titles. The tooltip is configured to share data across series. The legend uses a custom font style and color. The data series include two sets of monthly temperature data for 2022 and 2023, each with a distinct color. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
